input.value: Software Developer - OO / Big Data / Test Engineering

br.br:
req1433
Job Title:
Software Developer - OO / Big Data / Test Engineering
Number of Openings:
1
Job Category:
Professional/Technical
Employment Type:
Regular Full-Time
Shift:
First
Weekends:
Periodic
Location:
Bloomington, IL
Duties and Responsibilities:
Description
This position will focus on the architecture, strategic design, build, deploy, and support activities associated with Event Traceability and Systems Centralized Analytics. The successful candidate must have solution architecture, application development, data solution delivery, and test engineering experience.
Competencies Desired
Technical/Functional Expertise
Communication
Accountability
Industry Knowledge
Teamwork
Key Responsibilities
· Drive detailed design and implementation of Event Traceability and Systems Centralized Analytics
· Experimentation with tools/languages across development and data platforms
· Deep understanding of multiple data platforms
· Deep understanding of delivery platforms, application design & coding practices
· Stay current on industry trends
· Consulting with & mentoring technical teams on data access languages and patterns
Additional Details:
Key Skills & Abilities
· Subject matter expert in big data technologies and application development
· Proficiency with application development across distributed and host platforms.
· Ability to navigate & collaborate across locations & all levels of the organization
· Ability to cultivate effective working relationships & empower others
· Ability to quickly adapt to a changing environment
· Ability to coach and mentor others
· Ability to foster innovation, encourage diversity of thought, & incorporate new ideas
· Strong familiarity with Systems Department processes
· Experience or comfort working in a distributed, startup environment
· Strong communication skills, both verbal and written
· Relies on extensive knowledge & professional effectiveness to achieve goals
· Ability to learn, understand, & explain complex technical subjects & products
· Demonstrates an up-to-date technical acumen
This position will have an 18 month incumbency period for a lateral move and a 6-month incumbency period for a promotional opportunity (beginning on the effective date of the position) which must be met before the employee can post for any other State Farm position. The incumbency period does not affect the at-will relationship between State Farm and the employee and does not create an employment contract, nor contractual rights.

button.class: btn btn-primary btn-lg dice-btn apply disableButton
btn btn-default dice-btn-secondary hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl

div.p:
One State Farm Plaza
Bloomington, IL, 61791

div.div: With more than 65,000 employees and 18,000 agents serving more than 80 million policies and accounts, State Farm is proud to rely on the expertise of one of the nation’s largest IT teams. IT employees at State Farm benefit from size, security and the innovative spirit of an industry leader. With opportunities to work in select markets across the country, now’s the time to take your job to a better state and work for a company that values all you have to offer.
